name: OpenOracleData
description: The Open Oracle Data Base Contract.

functionDecorators.name: source
functionDecorators.description: Recovers the source address which signed a message. Comparing to a claimed address would add nothing, as the caller could simply perform the recover and claim that address.

parameterDecorators.name: message
parameterDecorators.description: The data that was presumably signed.

parameterDecorators.name: signature
parameterDecorators.description: The fingerprint of the data + private key.

returnDecorators.description: The source address which signed the message, presumably.
